forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Windy with morning showers evolving to a steady, soaking rain in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.
